overview: See what happens when sexually deprived divorcee, Jennifer (Katie Morgan), gets fed up and decides to venture into a world full of wild casual sex, orgasmic ecstasy, and risky business. with the help of her Ex-husband's horny assistant (Kat Dior) and a bombshell lawyer (Sarah Vandella), Jennifer sets out to take control of Bad Babes Inc., the secret XXX company her playboy husband ran into the ground during their marriage. From squirting, to deep doggie style, deep throating, and psychedelic sex, find out who will literally drop to their knees in order to save Bad Babes Inc.!
title: Bad Babes Inc
